long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ink is a note-taking tool that syncs your notes to all of your devices, be it mobile, desktop, web, cloud, cli or other.

you can easily search all of your notes and add new notes to it.

Features(comming soon):
- Upload Files
- Search Files
- Built In Calendar
